import React from "react"; const Cart = ({ cart, changeQuantity }) => { const total = () => { let price = 0 cart.foreach((item) => { price += (item.salePrice || item.originalPrice).toFixed(2) }) return price } return (

Cart

Book Quantity Price
{cart.map((book) => { return (
{book.title} ${(book.salePrice || book.originalPrice).toFixed(2)}
changeQuantity(book, event.target.value) } />
${((book.salePrice || book.originalPrice) * book.quantity).toFixed(2)}
); })}
Subtotal $9.00
Tax $1.00
Total ${total()}
); }; export default Cart;
